abstract: ask stacy : what are the best ways to save on moving ?
article: moving -- whether across town or across the country -- is no picnic . here are three tips that will make it a little easier , and a lot cheaper . welcome to `` ask stacy , '' a new video feature on money talks news . most weekdays , i 'll answer a money question sent in by a reader or viewer . if you 've ever moved your family across town or across the country , you 'll relate to today 's question . it 's about moving while keeping your cost and hassle to a minimum .

i 've moved several times . it 's not something i 'd wish on my worst enemy . but if there 's a move in your future , here 's how to make it as smooth as possible . it 's not the usual blah , blah , blah . click here to sign up for our free newsletter . if you did n't get everything you need from this video , we 've got plenty more info . start with this story : `` 10 ways to save money on moving , and minimize the headache . '' got a question you 'd like answered ?

you can ask a question simply by hitting `` reply '' to our email newsletter , just as you would any email in your inbox . if you 're not subscribed , fix that right now by clicking here . it 's free , only takes a few seconds and will get you valuable information every day ! the questions i 'm likeliest to answer are those that will interest other readers . in other words , do n't ask for super-specific advice that applies only to you . and if i do n't get to your question , promise not to hate me .

i do my best , but i get a lot more questions than i have time to answer . about mei founded money talks news in 1991 . i 'm a cpa , and have also earned licenses in stocks , commodities , options principal , mutual funds , life insurance , securities supervisor and real estate . got any words of wisdom you can offer on this week 's question ? share your knowledge and experiences on our facebook page . and if you find the information useful , please share it !
